name: The (SCOPUS/ISI) SOAS GLOCAL Conference on Asian Linguistic Anthropology 2023
content: The (SCOPUS/ISI) SOAS GLOCAL Conference on Asian Linguistic Anthropology 2023\. Dates: May 16-19 2023\. Locations: University of The Philippines, Diliman. Cohost: SOAS University of London, U.K. The (SCOPUS / ISI) GLOCAL CALA - the annual conference, workshops, lectures on the Linguistic Anthropology, Sociolinguistics, and Language and Society, of Asian. Theme: ‘Symbol and Society’. Papers: Should discuss the ways in which communication takes on both evolutionary and revolutionary form, following recent significant changes in Asian society, and in Asia’s new and revised interrelatedness across global scapes. Abstract Submission deadline: March 13, 2023\. Contact: Head of Communications: Ms. Nhan Huynh. Email: cala2021.upd@up.edu.ph. More details: https://cala2021.upd.edu.ph/. All papers accepted to the Proceedings will be SCOPUS/ISI indexed.
organizers: The SOAS GLOCAL, The SOAS Global Council for Anthropological Linguistics and University of The Phili
